abstract: Residents of Glendale, Ariz, remain skeptical about benefits of upcoming Super Bowl, which will be hosted nearby at University of Phoenix Stadium; town has suffered due to soured investments on sports in the past, and will spend millions policing Super Bowl despite fact that majority of guests will spend most of their time in nearby Phoenix and Scottsdale.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Glendale, Ariz., which is hosting the Super Bowl, is not shy about criticizing the costs involved, particularly since the city has a reputation for betting big on sports — and paying a price for it.
snippet: The mayor of Glendale, Ariz., which is hosting the Super Bowl, is not shy about criticizing the costs involved, particularly since the city has a reputation for betting big on sports — and paying a price for it.

headline.main: Albatross of Debt Weighs on Super Bowl City
headline.print_headline: Albatross of Debt Weighs on Super Bowl City
